class KdTreePointSet.KdTreePointSet(points, path=None, intensity=None, range_accuracy=0.002, angle_accuracy=0.012, measurement_accuracy=0.002, leaf_size=40, **kwargs)[source]¶

query(pnts, k)[source]¶

Query the kd-tree for the k nearest neighbors of a given set of points

Parameters

  • pnts (np.array nx3) – The query points

  • k (int) – The number of neighbors to find for the point

Returns

The indexes for the neighbors of the points

Return type

list of np.array

Note

Return the query points themselves as the first index of each list

queryRadius(pnts, radius, sort_results=False)[source]¶

Query the kd-tree to find the neighbors of a given set of point inside a given radius

Parameters

  • pnts (np.array nx3) – The query points

  • radius (float) – The query radius

  • sort_results (bool) – if True, the distances and indices will be sorted before being returned. If False, the results will not be sorted. If return_distance == False, setting sort_results = True will result in an error.

Returns

The indexes for the neighbors of the points

Return type

list of np.array

Note

Return the query points themselves as the first index of each list
